abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Fashionably Blue

abilities.description: All "Doll Squad" allies deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Doll Squad

441.description:
"The blade of truth that slices through evil! Hina Blue!"
Captain of the first unit of the Special Police Force, a group of swordsmen who maintained peace in the capital's streets. His body is riddled with disease, but you'd never guess it from his deft movements in battle. Add to that his characteristic refined looks, and he was a natural to be picked as Hina Blue. However, he's not great at playing up bravado, and as a result, he often looks awkward and out of place at key dramatic moments.
[Event]The Hina Doll Squad
441.name: Okita Soji [Blue]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: True Blue

abilities.description: Restores 20% HP to all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Healer

442.description:
"Ooh, so nice and warm..."
The Greek goddess of the hearth. Also called the virgin goddess. She loves sitting next to a nice, warm fire and just zoning out. Since most people find this relaxing atmosphere to be very enticing, few have anything but a positive opinion of her. The fact that she's a good listener and very likable means that people often ask her for advice with their problems in love, which she's usually able to resolve with great success.
442.name: Hestia

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Sacred Fire's Light

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Defensive Formation

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt and slightly decreases the ATK speed.
abilities.name: Super-Sized

443.description:
"It's time for...DAIRIOOO!!"
Whenever the Hina Doll Squad is in trouble, they can combine their powers to summon this defensive spirit. No one knows anything about its origins, development, structure, or power source...but it's probably safe to assume that Odairi had something to do with it.
443.name: Legendary Defender Dairio

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.
skill.name: Dairio Drive

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Rosy Doll

abilities.description: All "Doll Squad" allies deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Doll Squad

444.description:
"The rosy bloom that gives color to justice! Hina Pink!"
A doll used as decoration at Hina Matsuri. She gets along with Odairi as well as ever, but now it's come to light that she's been secretly working behind the scenes to pursue world peace. Any mention of this fact is strictly prohibited, and only the heads of state in each country know the truth.
444.name: Ohina [Pink]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies and increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Queen of Pink

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 10% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Kurama Pedigree

445.description:
"Super stoked and going for broke! Hina Red, ready to go!"
The spirit of a tengu goblin that lived on Mount Kurama. He actually comes from a pretty prestigious family, but he makes a point never to talk about it. He hasn't learned many fighting techniques, but the sheer force of his willpower and personality make him strong nonetheless. His unshakable sense of justice is why he was chosen as Hina Red, the central member of the Hina Dolls.
445.name: Oniichi Hogen [Red]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a wide area of enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Red Strike

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Divine Punishment

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Heaven's Grudge

446.description:
"I wonder if anyone will recognize me?! Heehee!"
The spirit of a legendary creature from European folklore. The gem of deep crimson she carries is said to hold incredible magical powers. She's also a master of disguises and likes to take on various appearances to trick people. But don't worry, she doesn't have any nefarious ends in mind. Her disguises are actually meant to bring justice to cruel villains through divine punishment.
446.name: Carbuncle

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority).
skill.name: Master of Disguises

abilities.description: 5% more DMG by all team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Student Body President

447.description:
"Don't forget to do your homework! Or brush your teeth! And don't kick the covers off when you're sleeping!"
A goddess from Greek mythology. She's what you'd call a star student—she LOVES to study. And she's especially into astronomy. Other spirits consider her elegant appearance to be something they could never hope to achieve in their wildest dreams. But this tends to give her a big head, and sometimes it's painfully obvious just how narrow-minded she is.
447.name: Urania

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Personal Horoscope

abilities.description: Deals 22% more DMG.
abilities.name: Unyielding Defiance

448.description:
"Hey there, little kitty... You like that?"
The spirit of an ancient rat. She's formed strong bonds of friendship with cats and loves to play with them. In fact, thanks to part-time work with her kitty friends, she's been able to buy a fancy furisode kimono. Lately she's been spotted all over town taking selfies in it.
448.name: Kyuso [Kimono]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Rat's Conviction

abilities.description: Reduces 6% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Ancient Song

449.description:
"I've been holding this thing up for millenia..."
The spirit of the oldest bell in Japan. Her voice has been described as either a dragon's roar or the instrument of the devil. Either way, it is captivating, and can't be easily ignored.
[Event] Guild Conquest
449.name: Belle Bonsho

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Howling Sound

45.description:
«¿Eh? Veo una cosita... que se aproxima desde lejos».
Una antigua diosa que preside sobre las fértiles orillas del Nilo. Los espíritus la tratan como si fuera una madre dada su generosidad y dulce compasión. Entre sus dotes destacan su aguda y penetrante intuición, la cual usa para dar consejos a aquellos que tienen algún problemilla.
45.name: Isis

skill.description: Restaura {value} de PS a todos los aliados.
skill.name: Madre celestial

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Emperor Wu

450.description:
"How do you choose to live your life?"
A well-known and cunning man from a time of great turbulence. He strives to enact his grand vision upon the world, piercing as the blue sky. Many historians have attempted to explain what happened during his legendary lifetime, but he only laughs at their "silly theories." It may very well be impossible to truly grasp the depths of his mind and the scope of his far-reaching vision.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
450.name: Cao Cao

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies; increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Man of Revolution

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Lifelong Dictator

451.description:
"And what amusements have you to offer, I wonder?"
A man of ambition in ancient Rome who seized his place in history. His interests were broad-ranging, from the military to the literary. He loved everything the world had to offer, wanting nothing more than to enjoy himself. This might sound innocent enough, but he actually hurt a lot of people in the course of satisfying his curiosity and greed, which is how he came to be considered a tyrant.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
451.name: Julius

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Victory Feast

abilities.description: Reduces 20% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Golden Inscription

452.description:
"Can you refute any of that? I don't think so."
The spirit of a sword created during the Namboku-cho Period of Japanese history. Historically speaking it was a hefty broadsword, but over the years people began to imagine her as an ordinary-sized sword. Belonging to Oda Nobunaga is her main claim to fame, and her name originates from their days together. She also LOVES to talk, and is the type to get into arguments really easily. Anyone who's done wrong in her eyes can expect to be argued into the corner and promptly crushed with logic and reasoning. At least, that's what the stories say, but in this case they might actually be true...
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
452.name: Heshikiri Hasebe

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Crushing Logic

453.description:
"It was a different time back then... I had to do it!"
The spirit of the man who planned and carried out the assassination of Julius Caesar. He was deeply impressed by the dazzling persona of Caesar, his mentor and father figure, and he saw himself as pathetic and weak in comparison. Now he's begun to reflect on his inability to overcome the self-loathing and negativity of those days, attributing it mostly to lack of willpower.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
453.name: Brutus

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target. Target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Assassin's Dagger

abilities.description: Reduces 3% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: High Priest

454.description:
"Ahem! That's all I can say about that...!"
A monk and consultant to the shogun who laid the foundations for 200 years of peace. His unusually long lifespan, the mysterious first half of his life, and the strange abilities he possessed led to many theories about his true identity. But he is in no position to speak on these matters, naturally, and keeps his mouth firmly shut.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
454.name: Tenkai

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun to targets.
skill.name: Behind the Scenes

abilities.description: 60% chances of inflicting Burn to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: In Blazes

455.description:
"I can't ignore this anger...!"
The site of Oda Nobunaga's dramatic final moments. Already chock full of powerful emotions, a touch of evil energy was all it took to give the temple its strange new form.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
455.name: Honnoji Mirage

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: Capricious Flame

abilities.description: f23ab46
abilities.name: Purity-Focused

456.description:
"I wonder what fate has in store for me next...?"
The spirit of the daughter of Akechi Mitsuhide. History wasn't kind to her, and she's now seen as having lived quite the checkered life. She can come off as a little intense due to her serious attitude and obsession with following the rules... But she behaves this way because she believes that living a proper life is the most efficient path to happiness. Perhaps her father's past deeds and karma also help push her down this strict path of integrity.
[Event]There's Something About Honnoji: The Q Incident
456.name: Hosokawa Tamako

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Stuck in Love

abilities.description: 464aca0
abilities.name: Embodiment of Mara

abilities.description: Increases all allies' Crit DMG by 10%.
abilities.name: Rule by Force

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Eccentric Warlord

abilities.description: Increases 30% of DMG dealt by Divina team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Private Secretary

458.description:
"I would go anywhere for Lord Nobunaga."
The spirit of a loyal attendant to Oda Nobunaga. He also served as his personal secretary and helped manage Nobunaga's military rule. He perished together with his lord during the Honnoji Incident.
458.name: Mori Ranmaru

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK, decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Ranmaru Rhythm

abilities.description: Increases 60% of Crit Rate at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Miracle Child

459.description:
"...Let's see, where should we start?"
A boy injured by Unholy Honnoji. His memory seems to have taken a hit from the shock of the attack as well...
459.name: Francisco

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Levitation

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente el daño de destrezas.
abilities.name: Estornudo venenoso

46.description:
«¿Y tú qué miras? ¿Quieres que te devore?».
Este molesto espíritu tiene fama de dar la tabarra a quienes se pasean por la playa. Desde que asumió su rol de auténtica pelmaza, sus payasadas se han vuelto notorias en todo el mundo. Escupe veneno al estornudar, así que procura mantener la pimienta bien lejos de ella.
46.name: Diablesa bovina

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 2 rivales (prioridad CaC), con {probability} de envenenarlos.
skill.name: Provisión infernal

abilities.description: 20% chances of inflicting Silence to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: Decaying Power

460.description:
"My feelings aren't worth wasting time on."
The spirit of a pope thought to have existed in medieval times. Her story is now recognized as pure fiction, but people developed an emotional attachment to her nonetheless and started to expect great things from her. It thus comes as no surprise that she has set her heart on becoming the standard-bearer in the fight against evil in all its forms.
460.name: Pope Joan

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.
skill.name: Hunting

abilities.description: Increases 50% of ATK speed at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: SURPRISE!

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 10% chances of inflicting stun.
abilities.name: What The Gods Fear

461.description:
"Did I get you that time?!"
The spirit of a mythological helmet. She's considered a genius when it comes to jump scares, and her performances can be downright dangerous to those who have heart conditions. One time she tested out an unimaginably scary surprise at the Bureau of the Occult, and...let's just say she got in big trouble with Mikado.
461.name: Helmetta Egil

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the lowest HP. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Heart Stopper

abilities.description: 80% chance of inflicting Burn to Normal attacks targets.
abilities.name: Kettle of Gunpowder

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Hisahide's Love

462.description:
"No explosions, please, that's all I ask..."
The spirit of a teakettle treasured by Matsunaga Hisahide during the Warring States Period. No matter how desperately Nobunaga coveted it, Hisahide refused to hand over his beloved teakettle, and for this she was very grateful. Needless to say she was shocked when he filled the teakettle with gunpowder to blow himself up! She never quite saw him the same way after that...
462.name: Ketill Hiragumo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to self, and increase DMG dealt by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: The Art of Self-Combustion

abilities.description: Increases 10% the number of soulstones received from battle.
abilities.name: Flower Seller

463.description:
"Would you like some flowers? They're really cheap!"
A strange spirit that can produce flowers from thin air. Creating flowers comes as naturally to her as breathing, and since it's free of charge, she can sell them at extremely low prices. But eventually she realized how much trouble she was causing for spirits who sell flowers for a living, so she decided to only sell flowers wholesale to retailers instead. This essentially gives her a monopoly on the wholesale market, but everyone agrees it's the best option for all parties involved in the long run.
463.name: Flora Kashin

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies.
skill.name: Petals in the Wind

abilities.description: Increases 3% all Divina team members' Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Clergyman

464.description:
"Ah, yes! I must make note of this!"
The spirit of a missionary who lived in Japan during the Warring States Period. He was deeply interested in Japan and wrote prodigiously while he was there, like some sort of pre-modern journalist. His extensive writings would later become deeply valuable historical documents for the time period. Since becoming a spirit he's taken up the job of traveling the world in search of newsworthy stories—and selling them for top dollar.
464.name: Luís Fróis

skill.description: Restores {value} HP; increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Observation and Analysis

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt by Divina team members when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Leader of the Four

465.description:
"Welcome to my palace, child of man."
The center of the universe and fifth of the Four Divine Beasts in Chinese astrology. She never shirks her position at the front and center of every conversation... In other words, she's very self-centered and gets in a bad mood if she's not the focus of attention at all times, no matter what people are talking about.
[Event] Guild Conquest
465.name: Huanglong

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Angry Dragon Roar

abilities.description: Increases the number of soulstones received from battle by 60%.
abilities.name: Wealthy Trader

466.description:
"Let's go to the beach! I miss that salty sea breeze!"
The spirit of a sailor from the story of One Thousand and One Nights. Formerly an esteemed adventurer in eternal pursuit of glory, he now travels the land recounting tales from his heyday. They say he has quite the stage presence, and his presentations are always bursting with excitement and surprise. A veritable master of entertainment, he comes up with all sorts of wild ideas to grab his audience's attention.
466.name: Sinbad

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies.
skill.name: Wave of Coral

abilities.description: Restores 10% HP to Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Wild Plant

467.description:
"Stay here with me and you'll be happy."
The spirit of a legendary plant said to grow in the wild. The plant grows a sheep instead of fruit, and once fully grown the sheep eats the plant for nourishment. After that the sheep roams free for awhile before finally dying, and then the plant grows once again from its body. It's like she's going through the process of reincarnation before your very eyes. In any case, she REALLY has a thing for sheep.
467.name: Barometz Tartarica

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Sheep Toss

abilities.description: Increases 75% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Rain of Sorrow

468.description:
"Quit crying and pull yourself together!"
The spirit of a bow that belonged to the Yellow Emperor in Chinese mythology. She refuses to forget her legendary former master and has shed many tears over him. The warm feelings he poured into her gave her great strength, enabling her to take on the sadness of the people and respond in kind... And that's just one small part of their sad, beautiful story together.
468.name: Ugo

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Call of Grief

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 15%.
abilities.name: Endless Funds

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Donation

abilities.description: Otorga alguna probabilidad de aletargar a los rivales a distancia al iniciar una ronda.
abilities.name: Última oportunidad

47.description:
«Venga, va... ¡Pero es tu última oportunidad!».
Un espíritu compasivo que se apiada incluso de las almas que no se lo merecen. Sin embargo, es bastante olvidadiza y ya ha dado de lado a algún que otro posible benefactor porque no tenía ganas. Con todo y con eso, es más probable que acabe dándote una buena charla antes que otra oportunidad. Pero bueno, así es la vida, ¿no? O al menos es lo que ella dice.
47.name: Hilo de araña

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a todos los rivales. Los objetivos sufren un +{delay1} de daño temporalmente.
skill.name: Cero oportunidades

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: The Thinker

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority).
skill.name: Think It Over

abilities.description: Reduces 3% of DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Cursed Chair

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority), decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Have a Seat

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by a random ally by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Mystic Smile

abilities.description: Increase 8% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Eye for Quality

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Power of Persuasion

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Nimble Fingers

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Magical Dexterity

abilities.description: Absorbs 30% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: The Perfect Thief

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Splendid End

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Man of Beauty

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords under Heaven is on the team.
abilities.name: Five Great Blades

skill.description: e0eefa9
skill.name: Straight to the Point

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit Rate.
abilities.name: Unfairly Matched

abilities.description: All Phantasma team members deal 5% more DMG.
abilities.name: Ruler of Demons

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies, with {probability} of inflicting Burn.
skill.name: de0bcc6

abilities.description: Increases 3% of Crit Rate of Anima allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: End of the Silk Road

abilities.description: ad1617b
abilities.name: Big Mama

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: 899a393

abilities.description: Increases 25% of DMG.
abilities.name: Me

changes.new: Increases 15% of Crit DMG when Mikazuki Munechika is on the team.
changes.old: Increases 15% of Crit DMG when {#MonsterName#476} is on the team.

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP.
skill.name: #ERROR!

48.description:
«Vamos, ¡mancilla mi espada con tu sangre!».
Una espada azul celeste codiciada por muchos y que acumula gran número de victorias en el campo de batalla. A lo largo de su carrera militar, le han concedido diversos ascensos a cargos de autoridad, puestos que él ha rechazado, pues prefiere la adrenalina que se respira al combatir en el frente.
48.name: Espada celeste

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual.
skill.name: Corte vital

abilities.description: Increases 75% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Tenacity

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 1 enemy (melee priority), decreases target's speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: 2404de4

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG of all anima allies.
abilities.name: Hero's Ally

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt; increases 15% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Rage

481.description:
"Don't give up as soon as you fail! You should stand up and try again!"
The spirit of a legendary sword possessed by the hero Sigurd. She was once beaten black and blue until her will was completely broken, but the support of her allies combined with her undying will to fight helped her to not only recover but also blossom into a new sword altogether—one strong enough to slay dragons. These experiences bestowed her with both heroic strength and deep compassion for the weak, making her an ideal partner for any hero.
481.name: Gramr

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target; reduces target's DEF by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Supreme Blade

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Skill DMG and increases 50% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Freeshooter

482.description:
"Would you mind working with me for a bit?"
The spirit of a ball of magic with a long story behind it. She's also a demon and has the power to grants people's wishes, but she always mixes in her own desires to take them one step too far. If you're not careful what you wish for, you might end up partially paralyzed, or worse. It's better to keep your distance and interact with her with utmost care. Many at the Bureau of the Occult still have bad memories from the time she pulled a prank involving fire... Although in the end, fault was found on both sides, and everyone's since been able to set aside their differences and work together without issue.
482.name: Zauber Kugel

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Seventh Shot

abilities.description: Decrease 5% the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Tempest

483.description:
"I'll do anything in my power..."
The spirit of a demonic entity dwelling on Suzuka Mountain. She's willing to put up with anything for the one she loves. Wanting to be liked is a big part of it, naturally, but not wanting to be disliked is probably more of a motivating factor...which kinda bothers her friends. They say she should be more bold, take a stand, capture people—you know, demonic stuff! But their words won't convince this bashful, warm-hearted demon. On the other hand, when she DOES get mad, even Shuten Doji can't stop her, so you're probably better off not messing with her.
483.name: Otakemaru

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Song of Love

484.description:
"Hope you're ready to get SOAKED!"
The spirit of a snake that can cause floods. She can't use her powers unless she happens to be particularly sad or angry, so most of the time all she does is spray people with a hand-crafted water hose and enjoy the looks of surprise on their faces. She's really just a harmless prankster at heart.
[Event] Guild Conquest
484.name: Kada

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with {probability} of inflicting Freeze.
skill.name: H2O Blast

abilities.description: Reduces 35% of DMG taken.
abilities.name: Knight's Conviction

485.description:
"Ha ha, no need for thanks! I'm just doing what knights do!"
The spirit of the titular character from the novel "Don Quixote." Don Quixote is a knight among knights who adheres strictly to the code of chivalry...at least that's how he hopes people will describe him one day. His strength is nothing to be trifled with, enabling him to wield a spear in just one hand. At heart he's a complete gentleman, but he has the bad habit of jumping into action based on simple misunderstandings. He's also acutely aware that he's not technically a knight and secretly feels guilty about misleading people.
[Event]Once Upon a Root...
485.name: Don Quixote

skill.description: Restores {value} HP. Target deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Chivalrous Heart

abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG.
abilities.name: Mysterious Shine

486.description:
"Miss Cinderella, where ARE you?!"
The spirit of the glass slipper from the story of Cinderella. Her personality is as delicate and breakable as glass, and you can always tell exactly what she's thinking and feeling from her face. The slipper was miraculously created by a powerful mage, and she has served as Cinderella's lifelong partner ever since. Only Cinderella is able to bring out Glassie's true powers, so together they are quite the pair. However, Cinderella tends to carelessly leave her behind, so she's often seen running around desperately in search of her friend.
[Event]Once Upon a Root...
486.name: Glassie Slipper

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to a random enemy, Decreases target speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Left Behind

abilities.description: Restores 2% of HP every 5 seconds by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Search for Happiness

487.description:
"I've been standing here the whole time..."
The spirit of the bluebird of happiness from the play "The Bluebird." Her blue-tinged armor is meant to be as eye-catching as the brilliant sky overhead...but somehow she just isn't the type to stand out in a crowd, so people tend to forget about her. With her quiet voice and reserved personality, many people don't even notice when she's standing right behind them.
[Event]Once Upon a Root...

skill.description: eda7ec4

«¡Tu ríete de mi tamaño, que ya verás!».
Un diminuto espíritu de las provincias del norte de Japón. Tiene energía como para parar un tren. Le gusta cazar monstruos del doble de su tamaño camuflándose tras las hojas de bardana y abalanzándose sobre ellos. Conoce muchísimo sobre esta planta y no se cansa de hablar de ella a todo aquel que se le ocurra sacarle el tema.

5.description:
«¡Arde, mi dulce espada!».
Un espíritu venerado como el dios del sol. En su mano derecha, porta una espada al tiempo que acumula perverso poder mágico en la izquierda. Podría considerarse un espadachín mágico. Siempre ha ocupado los mejores puestos de las lista de espíritus más ricos y la cifra de su cuenta bancaria da vértigo con solo mirarla. Es por ello por lo que no confía mucho en los demás; siempre se ve rodeado de espíritus que van tras su dinero.
5.name: Adramelech

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 3 rivales (prioridad CaC).
skill.name: Tormenta de balas mágicas

50.description:
«¡Mi perverso ojo lo destruye todo!».
Un poderoso espíritu venerado como el rey de las serpientes. Las historias sobre su mirada petrificante y su veneno letal hacen que cualquiera que oiga su nombre sienta escalofríos. Aunque nadie duda de sus dotes de combate, no está muy puesto en los temas de monarquía, así que todos están pendientes de ver cómo se desenvuelve.

507.description:
"The year's flying by so quickly, I tell you!"
The spirit of a bird whose song signals the start of the "Great Crossing Ceremony" in the Milky Way. She loves a good mystery and can often be found eagerly discussing conspiracy theories. She and her husband are passionately in love with each other, so much so that even Vega and Altair get jealous.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
507.name: Maggie Pie

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the lowest percentage of HP.
skill.name: Song of Love

abilities.description: Increases skill DMG of all team members by 8% when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: The First

508.description:
"It's really quiet in outer space."
The spirit of the first man-made satellite to orbit Earth. After accomplishing this incredible feat the satellite burned up in the atmosphere, which was very traumatic and gave her a deep fear of fire. As a spirit she's on a mission to "explore the whole wide universe," but on that scale the Earth is like a tiny appetizer before the main course. So she hasn't gotten much respect for her exploits thus far.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
508.name: Sputnik

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK, increases {delay1} crit rate to target for a limited time.
skill.name: Other Side of the Universe

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP every 5 seconds.
abilities.name: Hopeless Romantic

509.description:
"I've so much more to learn..."
The spirit of the stream of stars that dot the night sky. The Tanabata Festival used to play an important role in people's lives, but over the years many people have lost interest. This made her realize that traditions aren't meant to last forever, and they should adapt to suit the needs of people's modern lives.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
509.name: Milkana Wayford [Formal Wear]

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Cosmic Romance

51.description:
«¡Uy! Esto me da mala espina...».
El espíritu de una conejita que fue bendecida por un dios. Está convencida de que los sueños tan vívidos que tiene al echarse la siesta ocultan algún mensaje. Por desgracia, suele despertarse al llegar a la parte importante, así que poco puede descifrar.

changes.new:
"Eeep! I've got a bad feeling about this..."
A rabbit spirit who received the grace of a god. She's convinced the vivid dreams she has whenever she takes a nap are trying to tell her something. Unfortunately, they have an uncanny knack of ending before the most important part, and as a result are totally useless.
[Special Bond] Increases Okuninushi's skill DMG

510.description:
"I must change myself, too."
The spirit of the daughter of the Sky King from the story of Tanabata. The fiasco with the Great Crossing Ceremony made her reflect on her past actions and decide to do things differently in the future. Now she's trying to get in touch with the "real" her after realizing that she has a lot of work to do if she wants to hold a place in people's hearts.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
510.name: Orihime [Formal Wear]

abilities.name: Journey to the West

511.description:
"I was young and dumb back then, okay?"
The spirit of one of Sanzang's companions in Journey to the West. He's also known in Japan as Son Goku. He's begun to feel a sense of justice and a desire to help the weak, like what you'd expect from a king of the monkeys. So by all accounts he certainly SEEMS to have matured a lot...but in the thick of battle you can still see the burning passion in his eyes as he wields his powers to the fullest, filled with excitement and joy.
[Event]To the Source of the Milky Way
511.name: Sun Wukong

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the least HP, with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.

abilities.name: Emperor's Symbol

512.description:
"Do you like to play hide-and-seek?"
The spirit of the imperial seal passed down from dynasty to dynasty in Chinese history. Whoever possesses the seal is declared emperor, which has gotten her into all sorts of messy situations and made her go missing more than once. But at least now she's a self-proclaimed expert at hide-and-seek. She's also had the chance to get to know a lot of famous people over the centuries and has some interesting anecdotes to share as a result. But no one's quite sure how much is fact and how much is fiction—not even her!
512.name: Seel Imperio

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 3 allies (melee priority); increases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.

513.description:
"What do we really seek...?"
The spirit of a cowherd who appears in the story of Tanabata. He lives in love and harmony with Vega, without a care in the world. At least that's what he says...
513.name: Hikoboshi [Formal Wear]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to nearby enemies. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Unyielding Determination

abilities.name: Furious Flyer

abilities.name: Magical Moving Cloud

changes.new:
"That touch, that smell...! Ah, how I missed this!"
The spirit of a magic cloud that soars through the skies. She likes to partner up with people whose hearts are beautiful and dreams are pure, in addition to being strong. She's been working with Sun Wukong for longer than anyone else, and their relationship is filled with deep, mutual respect. Apparently some spirits get excited just to witness the two of them working together.
[Special Bond] Increases Sun Wukong's skill DMG

515.description:
"What? Did something go wrong again...?"
The spirit of one of Sanzang's companions in Journey to the West. He's better known to most people as Sha Wujing, but in Heaven he goes by his official title as a general. Always the analytical type, he tends to forget his surroundings in his internal quest to reach a logical conclusion. He's also extremely honest about things and can be a little awkward, but it's also refreshing to watch him stubbornly push forward with his logic. He may not talk much, but when he does, he gets to the point and makes sure not to do anything that would injure his pride. Needless to say, his personal values often clash with his companions' more carefree approach to life.
515.name: General Juan Lian

516.description:
"No mistakes for me today, not one!"
The spirit of a valkyrie who guides the souls of fallen warriors to a palace in heaven. After marrying Siegfried, the strength of their love helped her awaken to her true calling in life. Her powers are truly formidable, binding together the world, the gods, and humanity through the power of death.
516.name: Brynhildr [True Form]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (melee priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.

abilities.description: All allies take 3% less DMG.
abilities.name: Heirloom Fragrance

517.description:
"Feeling a little more sophisticated now, aren't you?"
The spirit of a treasured piece of fragrant wood handed down in the Hosokawa family. She is one among four pieces from the same tree but is very highly regarded in the (admittedly small) fragrant wood community. She doesn't just bask in the glory, though—instead she devotes herself to healing the hearts of those who appreciate a good aroma. However, she has a petty side and refuses to show interest in those who don't care for her scent.
517.name: Chrysanthia White

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK.
skill.name: Concentration

abilities.description: Increases 60% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Thousandfold Surprise

518.description:
"Heh, heh, you're gonna love this one!"
The spirit of a tanuki who loves playing practical jokes and devotes her life to them. Her pranks are multi-faceted and cause her targets to be suspicious of even the most harmless objects for days afterwards. She once pulled a pretty extreme prank on Mikado and was put through the wringer afterwards, so now she makes sure not to do anything that causes actual harm or that her victims don't personally find funny.
518.name: Danzabura Tanuki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP. Target take {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

519.description:
"You know what happens if you're rude to me, right?"
The spirit of the king of Britain. He led a dramatic life that involved a wizard, a legendary sword, and the Knights of the Round Table. Nowadays, as one of the most famous subjects of research and reenactments, he's well-known to many...and yet he has his insecurities nonetheless. Suffice it to say, he lacks emotional stability and tends to fly off the handle.
[Event] Guild Conquest
519.name: Arthur Pendragon

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (healers priority), with a {probability} of inflicting Silence.

52.description:
«¿Estás bien? ¿No tienes frío?».
Un espíritu con un carácter sorprendentemente cálido. Este amable espíritu de la nieve hará todo lo que esté en su mano por mostrar un trato apacible y caluroso. Además de cierta tendencia a empinar el codo de vez en cuando, también tiene por costumbre berrear y hacer chistes malos cuando se anima más de la cuenta.
52.name: Yuki Onna

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 3 rivales (prioridad CaC), con {probability} de congelarlos.
skill.name: Investigación nívea

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Worldly Suffering

520.description:
"Where would my strengths best be used?"
The spirit of a poet from the Kamakura Period. Originally a samurai, he later became a monk. He and Yoritomo Minamoto go way back, and Saigyo advised him on how to organize the music festival. He's great when it comes to at looking at the bigger picture, easily able to analyze a situation and figure out what to do next. But sometimes he can get a little carried away...
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
520.name: Saigyo

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

abilities.description: Increases 10% of Crit rate.
abilities.name: Instrument of Revolution

521.description:
"I am without peer as a violinist."
The spirit of a man known as the premier violin virtuoso of his day. Minamoto contacted him about including one of his breathtaking performances in the festival. He has a unique artistic vision to which he holds true in all his work. His lack of interest in anything besides music has caused a number of problems, but it never seems to motivate him to make any changes. Maybe he really DID sell his soul to obtain those extraordinary skills of his...
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
521.name: Niccolo Paganini

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

522.description:
"This one's gonna get your heart racing!"
The spirit of a ritual gong stand declared to be a National Treasure. Highly excitable and with a very loud voice, she tends to draw a lot of attention to herself. That said, she isn't the type to perform on her own, she'd rather be part of an ensemble. Apparently Homer served as her producer on their piece for the music festival.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
522.name: Kay Kagen

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Assist Class Daemon

523.description:
"You're gettin' a taste of the real deal today, baby!"
The spirit of the first electric guitar on earth. She's a very...unique...spirit who tends to stand out in a crowd. She's pretty well-known among musical spirits, but her ostentatious sensibilities and lifestyle sometimes make her clash with spirits who come from other times and places in history.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
523.name: Fryeen Panna

abilities.description: Deals 20% more DMG.
abilities.name: Immortal Poet

524.description:
"Don't let me forget to write in my diary today!"
The spirit of one of the 36 Immortal Poets. She's known for compiling the Kokinshu, an ancient anthology of poetry, but she claims it was just something she threw together "in her spare time." Nonetheless, her skills are deeply respected by other spirits. She also has a severe side and can be quite harsh when reviewing the work of her fellow poets...but with fans, she is nothing but professional and polite.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
524.name: Kino Tsurayuki

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).

abilities.description: All divina allies take 5% less DMG.
abilities.name: Troubadour

525.description:
"I'm seeing a lot of potential here..."
The spirit of the legendary author of the Iliad and the Odyssey. She decided to devote herself to the festival's success in order to boost her own career, thinking that any hard work now would pay off in acknowledgement and recognition later.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
525.name: Homer

526.description:
"My voice is my greatest treasure."
The infamous singing ghost. Her music is top-of-the-line when it comes to making audiences cry, thanks to her deeply sensitive nature. It's no exaggeration to say she puts a little of herself into each and every song she sings. Minamoto fell in love with her music the first time he heard it, and he was convinced to organize the whole festival solely for the purpose of introducing her music to the world.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival
526.name: Siren [Singer]

527.description:
"The country's come a long way since my day."
The spirit of a shogun who relocated Japan's capital to Kamakura. During his lifetime he did everything he could to consolidate power through military force, but these days he's more interested in culture and the arts—especially in how people form bonds through music. As a spirit, he's taken it upon himself to promote music and a sense of community across the land.
[Event] The Great Feudal Music Festival

Una maniática de la limpieza especializada en sacar lustro a las judías de azuki. El delicioso sabor de estas se ha ganado la admiración de medio mundo, aunque, en realidad, no es que trabaje tanto como se piensa. Principios de primavera y finales de otoño son las dos épocas en las que más trabajo tiene.

536.description:
”Time truly flies quickly. “
The Spirit who leads the swordsmen of Shinsengumi group one protecting the capital. Although his body condition had never been fully recovered, he keeps training himself and now has become widely known as one of the most powerful persons in the Bureau of the Occult. In these two years through continuous training, he has pushed himself to a new level.

However, she has just started as a heroine and lacks experience. It is believed that she has a bright future. Is she a soldier or an idol? A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is a stoic with far superior endurance than anyone. She is renowned as an expert sniper. Her skills are not limited to rifles, but also throwing weapons that include any means of attacking from a distance. Because she needs to snipe in space, she has to use her senses to overcome any interference in physics and keep herself highly concentrated. It is unknown if that is the reason she is eating sweets all the time.

However, she is really scared of the ocean and monster. The dark side of her personality reveals when she faces her weakness. She has a well-established personal network, and capable to connect with any corner of the universe. Regardless of the status, she has such great magnanimity to accept others. Looking at their organized army, Sola named them the "Earth Defense Force". He takes discipline, reward and punishment very seriously. He made a great effort trying to maintain a good relationship among the spirit of constellations. It was never easy for him commanding an army of veterans. Zeus and Athena are father and daughter.

Whenever he is in a bad mood, he attacks everything on sight. It is believed that he is one of the four malefic in the Chinese mythology. "Wow, this dude is so powerful……"
A spirit of the demon who made his base in the Suzuka mountain. She worked hard to improve in her own way in order to get closer to the one she loves. With the help of many, now she could at least talk normally to the one she loves, but she still gets too nervous sometimes and acts a bit strange. People around her are getting even more impatient with her. Otakemaru's struggle for love may eventually come through some day.

"Eh? My main skill should be swordsmanship……?"
The spirit transformed by a member of the Shinsengumi second team, a group of swordsmen who protected Kyoto in the past. He is well known for his swordsmanship mastery, and he seems to improve even more after he transformed into a spirit. Although he got used to being a tough guy, recently people seem to change their expectations about him. Rather than a sword master, people hope he gets better to pick on someone else.

"I have had enough with rain……"
A spirit transformed from Chinese umbrella. The spirit is famous with many different appearances, that even other spirits respect her because of that reason. However, she thinks that has nothing to do with her. She wants to live where the wind breezes through. Dance freely wherever she wants is her living purpose. ……Perhaps it is her personality not to think too much, or who knows it might be only one of her appearances in the journey of seeking for truth.

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.

«¡Póstrate ante mis poderosos puños!».
Miembro de los «diminutos» número 2, famosa por sus clásicas apariciones en todo juego de rol que se precie. Con tal de honrar a su estirpe, su tarea es la de «dar por saco al protagonista» al comienzo de su aventura. También es una gran apasionada de las artes marciales.
Vínculo especial Aumenta el daño de Brutrasga.

"Come to me with a pure heart."
The spirit of a jewel said to fulfill wishes in Buddhism and Hinduism. He is considered roughly equivalent to the Philosopher's Stone in the West. He gets along swimmingly with dragons and spends most of his time around them. He even relies on dragons for personal transportation, almost like some kind of personal dragon taxi service.
[Event] Guild Conquest

"Oh no...! Maybe too late...
The spirit of Dorothy from the fairytale "The Wizard of Oz" She loves TV series rated for families and children, now often repeating the same lines in an exaggerated way. Lately "Prophecies of Nostradamus" becomes her favorite book. While Dorothy enjoys the Halloween party at the Spirit Academy, she got involved in the "Mystery of the Vanished Tableware". It is believed that the mystery has been caused by the Illuminati formed by extra-terrestrial beings.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween

"I am~~ innocent~~!"
A zombie spirit who really loves Halloween festival. She starts getting bored by the surprising sight on her, and now she wishes to live normally like normal girls. Recently, she gets annoyed by the fact that milk turns into yogurt in time. Because of her infamous record last year, she quickly became the prime suspect in the "Mystery of the Vanished Tableware" in the Halloween party... The phrase "Zombie yuck!" is taboo at her presence.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween

"Hahaha! Forget it and drink~!"
A spirit of lantern used at a flea market booth being preserved nicely for many years.She works as the banner girl for the Japanese pub, and serves customers equally by ensuring all of them have a good and comfortable time. She plans to secretly investigate the Halloween party and give suggestion to the symbol spirit of the festival "Halloween lantern," but she got drunk in the party and totally forgot her own plan. She loves saying "Forget about details, just have a good time!" as an excuse, but perhaps she only loves alcohol... though she knows it's just not right.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween

"I am HUNGRY! Give me food!"
She is an energetic troublemaker who loves to bump around and can't stay still for a moment. Although she possesses an extraordinary power, she gets hungry too often and runs out of energy. She tends to follow whoever gives her food, although she knows that it is her weakness, she would say, "Because I am not good at thinking complicated things" as an excuse. An unexpected part from her is, a naughty brat like her always returns a favor seriously.

"Persistence is difficult, but it always pays off.
The spirit of a prominent Japanese bacteriologist who made a great contribution.Because of his expertise in medical science, he has a deep connection with the Bureau of the Occult, and many Spirit Agents benefit from his work. He is also an instructor at the Spirit Academy. Every day he teaches complicated topics with enthusiasm and he patiently listens to his students when they seek his opinion. He earned the respect of many students and as a supervisor of the academy festival he got involved in the incident.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween

"Fame is not something built overnight."
Spirit of the most precious western porcelain ware. She was raised in a noble family with a sincere and sturdy personality. She won't forgive anyone who places a finger through the handle of a tea cup. On the other hand, she pushes herself too much and as a result the delicate side in her becomes rather vulnerable. Her words "A noble person should bare the related responsibility" has made her widely respected by many spirits. Because of her goof behavior, she has been elected as a member of the "Festival committee". However no one knows that it triggers the incident...

He values tradition and formality and naturally he opposes the school festivals being held. His action caused many pressures on him and he had no choice but to adapt to this new era trend. His superior ability often made him isolated, nonetheless there are always fearless spirits in the academy who became acquainted with him. Rumors said that gods under similar circumstances often open out to each other.

578.description:
"Not too many and not too few! Precision is everything...
The spirit of the Japanese ghost tale "Sarayashiki".She is an energetic girl who took the position of "Academy executive committee". She might be too focus and becomes stubborn sometimes at work, and she cannot move on to the next job without finishing the work on hand. When she pays at a convenient store, she would feel lucky if she has the exact change. Although sometimes she is labeled as a "troublemaker", her root is a nice personality attracting many suitors. In the past, she saw her mother-in-law could not find herself all the dishware and developed into bullying the housewife. It seems that marriage problems also exists in spirit families.
[Event] Record of the Spirit Halloween
578.name: Sarayashiki

58.description:
«Objetivo a la vista. Permíteme actuar con honor».
El animia de un arma ninja que perteneció a un guerrero de renombre. Su única preocupación es cumplir su misión. Es un auténtico ninja con un gran sentido del deber que llevará a cabo su faena sin importarle los peligros a los que se enfrente.
58.name: Shuriken

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a un rival aleatorio.
skill.name: Aniquilación aérea

skill.name: Purify

abilities.name: Secret Incense

583.description:
"Does anyone feel sick?"
The spirit of incense in slumber at the Shōsōin.She is familiar with incense and medicine, and to many spirits she has the image of a goddess who heals the mind and body. Even those who fainted or their hands and feet have gone cold, anyone in her care can be revived immediately. Because of her beautiful appearance, the spirit she revived often propose to her once they got back on their feet, and it seems to be happening everyday now. As the secret collection of Big Mom at the Shōsōin, they have a very close relationship like real mother and daughter.
583.name: Lady Musk

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Healing Aroma

abilities.description: Increases 4% of DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Father of the Sword Saint

584.description:
"Show me what you got!"
The spirit of a great tactician, and the father of sword saint.He is a tough and broad-minded instructor who trains spirits at the academy. He is a master of all martial arts, and especially skilled in using dagger. He felt gratified looking at Musashi and Kojiro sparring with each other, but he also worries that they might surpass him someday. For that reason, he challenges other acquaintance sword masters imperatively, even if his challenge is not accepted. He is the type of person who cares nothing that happens around him once he gets overexcited.
584.name: Grandmaster Shinmen

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Dagger Rush

abilities.description: Increase 10% of DMG dealt by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Master of Yamabiko

585.description:
"The nature is important~~ (Very important~~)"
The spirit of an ancient tree on the Holy mountain.She appears very young, but she is one of the most ancient creations in the world. Wherever she speaks echo can be heard, wherever plants grow she can teleport to anywhere, and she can manipulate sound at will. She dislikes solitude, and so when someone calls out in the mountain, she always replies right away.
585.name: Dryad

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Target takes {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Noisy Echo

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken and Increases 15% of max HP.
abilities.name: The Libra

586.description:
"……Do you seek balance?"
A spirit transformed from the Ptolemy 48 constellation. She is also one of the twelve powerful zodiacs chosen by the sun. Although she acts as a mediator in a quarrel, but most of the time she would rather that both sides confront each other by force. It is her characteristic to use such rough methods in mediation. If troubles can be resolved easily, of course it would be great……
[Event] Guild Conquest
586.name: Stella: Libra

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to 2 enemies (ranged priority), Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Grand Crush

abilities.description: All divina allies take 2% less DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Spirit of Benevolence

587.description:
"Oops, that's bad... Thanks for taking the trouble."
A spirit transformed from the witch house in a story from Grimms' Fairy Tales. Has the special ability to change everything she touches into candies and gives them out indiscriminately to friends and foes as long as they are hungry. She is a kind and caring big sister. Although it was not her intention, she had inadvertently exposed Hansel and Gretel to danger and has taken upon herself to protect the siblings as a way to redeem her own wrongdoing. Recently, she has been preoccupied with helping Gretel, who has reached the age to become rebellious, to become more honest with her feelings.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
587.name: Candy House

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Avalanche of Candy

abilities.description: Increases 45% of DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Government Spy

588.description:
"That's alright; We'll just cross the bridge when coming to it!"
A spirit transformed from a renowned Haikai Poet during the Edo era. After becoming a spirit, he continues to travel across the country in a leisurely manner while reciting haikai poems. However, there had been rumors that he was actually a secret spy working for the government, and that he is a close friend of Hattori Hanzo Masanari. Expertly skilled in the martial arts, he has recently picked up the habit of identifying talented youths and offering his tutelage in way that is close to harassment. Despite his cheery demeanor and whimsical behaviors, his disciples had pointed out that he is actually unpredictable in his temperaments.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
588.name: Matsuo Basho

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Punchline

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG dealt and 5% of max HP.
abilities.name: Beast Instincts

589.description:
"I am not fond of this form because it is not cute at all!"
A mysterious pretty gal (self-claimed) spirit who is a giant panda in her true form. She is also known by her moniker as "the spirit of panda". She tries her best to maintain her cute appearance but once she runs out of bamboos, she would go into withdrawal and unleash her instincts as a carnivorous beast. When transformed, her battle power sky rockets so much that even other spirits like Kintaro who are confident in their physical prowess would avoid getting into direct confrontation with her. Each time she involves herself in a deadly duel, her head and face would be splattered by the blood spilled by her opponents, and she has eventually earned the nickname of "Red Riding Hood" within the sumo wrestling circle.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
589.name: Giant Panda ［Untamed］

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Strength of Wilderness

59.description:
«Je, je, je. ¡Tendrías que haberte visto la cara!».
Esta tímida granujilla suele morar en lo alto de las colinas de Japón, donde se dedica a asustar a los transeúntes como pasatiempo. Por suerte, sus bromas no pasan de chiquilladas, pero todo el mundo coincide en que es bastante pesada. Suele ocupar un lugar destacado en la galería de «pillines» de la Agencia de lo Oculto.
59.name: Candela Fatua

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a un rival aleatorio y reduce su daño un {delay1} temporalmente.
skill.name: Fuego de agravio

abilities.description: Increases 30% of ATK speed.
abilities.name: Coward

590.description:
"I fail at everything I do..."
A spirit transformed from one of the titular characters from Grimms' Fairy Tales (the brother). Ever since his encounter with the witch who nearly succeeded in eating him in the fairy tale, Hansel has been traumatized, making him extremely timid and introverted. Due to his self-loathing, he keeps blaming himself for"being entirely of no help to others." The truth is, he is capable of getting things done as long as he puts his mind to it; all it takes is for the right opportunity to present itself for his talents to bloom. Recently, he has been troubled by the fact that his adorable sister has reached the age of rebellious adolescence.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
590.name: Hansel

skill.description: Increases DMG dealt by the ally with highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: White Stone Way Marker

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Reliable Sister

591.description:
"Oh this is such a hassle. I'll take all of you on, at once!"
A spirit transformed from the double-bitted axe that Minos wielded in mythology. Although she has bonded deeply with Minos as her partner over the years, the fact that Minos suffers from solitude due to her obsession with the pursuit of power has brought much dismay to Labrys. Despite her seemingly uncultured demeanor, she is actually kind and considerate at heart, making her surprisingly popular. While there had been rumors that suggest Minos and she are couples, no one stupid enough make such claims in front of Labrys had remained in one piece to verify the truth of the rumor.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
591.name: Labrys

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Strike and Slice

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit Rate and 30% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: God of Destruction

592.description:
"Get lost...I have no interest in the weak!"
A spirit transformed from a minotaur in the Greek mythology. She is a ferocious fighter who sees "fighting" as the meaning of existence and finds joy from fighting strong foes in order to build her own confidence. With an upright and honorable character that is typical of a true warrior, she would spare the lives of her opponent as soon as she realizes that they no longer have the spirit to fight. Cursed by the misfortune that surrounds her birth, Minos has been driven to seek answer for the question that would justify her existence: "What is power?" She is an old acquaintance and a good friend of Daedalus.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
592.name: Minos

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Raging Bull

abilities.description: Increases 10% of skill DMG dealt at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Awakening

593.description:
"You shall witness my true strength! "
A spirit transformed from the renowned Sakata no Kintoki, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko. In order to settle his years of unfinished feud with his fighting buddy "Giant Panda," Kintaro came to Mount Kikoku but inadvertently got involved in the incident. Feeling that his involvement with trivial affairs has affected his fighting prowess, Kintaro has been seeking ways to reinvigorate himself and under the tutelage of Matsuo Basho, he attained awakening and unleashed his true power. "Yokozuna" is the highest rank in sumo wrestling. However,"sumo" refers to an ancient martial art that later developed into different disciplines, not the modern day sport.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
593.name: Kintaro [Yokozuna]

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to further enemies; Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Air Demon Strike

abilities.description: At the start of the final wave, all foes take 20% more damage.
abilities.name: Legend of the Red Leaves

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG dealt by Phantasma team members at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Lineage of Mara

594.description:
"Come, entertain me.
A spirit transformed from a kijou at Mount Togakushi. Proud and willful, she is antagonistic in character despite her beautiful looks. She has no control over her whims and anything she feels like doing, she will just go ahead with it. Although she has always been a troublemaker, no one was ever able to get truly upset with her. Due to her lineage of Mara, she possesses great power. Despite her penchant for schemes and evil plans, her careless nature has often led her to failures. As a member of the demons just like Shuten Doji and Ibaraki Doji, she plays the role of "bad company" for them.
[Event] Maze of Red Leaves
594.name: Momiji Hime

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Scheme and Machination

abilities.name: Spider that Summons Death

skill.name: The Choices of Despair

abilities.description: Decreases 45% the ATK speed of all foes.
abilities.name: Woman's Heart and Autumn Sky

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets receive {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.

abilities.name: King of Giant Strength

abilities.description: Increases 2% of max HP of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Nine-Headed Ox-Demon King

599.description:
"What? Would you like a taste of my power?"
A spirit transformed from the renowned ox demon from the classic Journey to the West. She once fought under the banner with her sworn brother Sun Wukong in rebelling against the Jade Emperor but when she was defeated. She repented her errors and righted her ways. As a generous and forgiving person, she is agreeable to almost all suggestions but it also makes her an easy target of manipulation by cunning spirits. It has been bothering her. Nevertheless, her power definitely lives up to her past title as a menace of the heavens. It is said that whenever she throws a tantrum, Sun Wukong is the only one capable of stopping her.
599.name: Heiten Taisei

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to current target, with a {probability} of inflicting Stun.
skill.name: Crushing Death

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente el daño de los miembros divinia con este demonio de líder.
abilities.name: Hijo de los dioses

6.description:
«Reuníos, camaradas. ¡Hay alguien a quien debemos vencer!».
El legendario guerrero que luchaba contra los demonios acompañado de un perro, un mono y un faisán. No destacó por sus dotes con la espada ni sus habilidades en combate, pero su valentía innata, su enorme preocupación por sus amigos y su liderazgo visionario le permitieron cumplir sus metas. Ahora, después de mucho, pero que mucho entreno y práctica, por fin se ha convertido en un luchador de élite.
6.name: Momotaro

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual.
skill.name: Llanto de los dioses

60.description:
«¡Uy, uy! ¡Hola! ¿Te importaría ponerme un poco de crema en la espalda?».
Diosa del mar y miembro de un grupo de sirenas conocidas como las Nereidas. Además de generar olas mediante sus artes, también puede lanzar temibles ataques psíquicos mediante dulces cantinelas. Eso sí, lo de cantar no se le da muy bien, y tanto aliados como rivales suelen reírse de ella.
60.name: Nereida Proto

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a los 3 rivales con menos PS.
skill.name: Melodía prohibida

abilities.description: Increases 40% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
abilities.name: Dual Wield

600.description:
"Niten Ichiryu Cloudless Sky!"
A spirit transformed from the Book of Five Ringsauthored by the swordsman Miyamoto Musashi. With the ability to freely perform sword techniques of "earth, water, fire, wind and sky, "the spirit even has the potential to defeat Musashi himself as long as all the right conditions are met. On a related note, after his transformation into a spirit, he has taken an interest in sports and compared to his swordsmanship, he is now more competent in track and field. According to his own words, "It is too barbaric for people to kill each other. In this modern times, sports allows participants to show appreciation for the effort and performance of one another and as such, it is the best!"
600.name: The Book of Five Rings

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Secret Tech [Earth]

abilities.description: Increases 20% of DMG and Reduces 5% of max HP.
abilities.name: Gate of Trouble

601.description:
"Public opinion is a frightening thing…"
A spirit transformed from the infamous queen who lost her life during the French Revolution. Even after becoming a spirit, her habit of having the last word proved to die hard, making her a figure of controversy time and again. Despite her intelligence and prudent nature, Marie suffers a good deal from rumors and outright slanders targeted against her, which is probably the result of her nasty mouth. In fact, the situation has gotten so bad that she will most definitely say something highly objectionable whenever she gets any screen time on SNS, and some have even come to recognize it as her unique talent.
601.name: Marie Antoinette

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Extravagant Tea Party

abilities.description: Increases 20% of skill DMG of Phantasma team members.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Messenger of God

602.description:
“Calm the heart...“
A spirit that embodies the 48 Ptolemy Constellations. Often drifting in space, her existence is akin to God’s messenger. On some planets, she is actually worshipped as a deity. As she has already attained enlightenment, she does not communicate with words but shows her mercy and benevolence through her actions with her Buddha-like personality. And as such, many space spirits would often go to her to seek her advice.
[Event] Guild Conquest
602.name: Stella: Aquila

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Winds of Mercy

abilities.description: Normal attacks decrease the current target's ATK speed by 25%.
abilities.name: Shiva's aide

abilities.description: Increases 20% of Crit Rate and increases 20% Crit DMG
abilities.name: Gigantic footprints

603.description:
"Sigh～ Where has Lady Shiva gone to?"
A spirit transformed from a member of the warrior tribe dwelling in the depths of snowy mountains. His duty is to stay by Shiva's side and keep her protected. However, because of Shiva's penchant to vanish from sight whenever there is a concert coming, he has been deeply perplexed. As Shiva yields great power, it isn't really her safety that he is concerned with; he is more worried that others would get on her nerves unknowingly and enrage her. So in reality, his job is to stay on top of things before Shiva loses her temper and get the situation sorted out as quickly as possible. Apparently, he has been taking medication for his stomach problems due to stress. Tsti and Miti are his family members.
603.name: Yeti

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK, decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Dance of Ice

abilities.description: Absorbs a 15% of DMG dealt as HP.
abilities.name: The resurrected

604.description:
"You thought I died?　Too bad."
A spirit transformed from the fourth princess of Russia's last Tsar. She is a naive tom-boy with nicknames such as "Destroyer of Locks" and "The Resurrected". When she was still in the mortal world, she studied under Rasputin and proven herself as a genius with her mastery of the magical arts within an incredibly short period of time. News of her pranks with grievous consequences have been commonplace. But after her transformation as a spirit, she has taken a liking to enjoy a lifestyle of peace. It is said she has been obsessed with SNS as of late. She became good friends with Marie Antoinette (who shared similar fates with her) through the internet and the two have been having tea parties while enjoying leisurely conversations.
604.name: Anastasia

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Lock Breaker

abilities.description: Increases 5% all Divina team members' Crit Rate.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Red-Nose

605.description:
"Here comes! I am going to deliver all the presents!"
A spirit transformed from one of the reindeers that have been working with Miss Santa. Incidentally, "Rudolph the Red Nosed" is more like a title rather than a name, and she happens to be the 3rd generation of Rudolph in training. With a natural disposition to get carried away and acting rashly, her ego can bloat without control if one ever makes the mistake of praising her for anything and it makes her a tricky character to deal with. However, she has a knack for easing the tension of any situation with her presence. This Christmas event is her first time to work independently, and it explains why she seems to be particularly focused and dedicated. On a side note, the person to hold the title of Rudolph before her happens to be her mother - one whom she fears the most.
[Event] Two Santas
605.name: Rudolph the Red Nosed

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Blazing Speed! Super Expedited Delivery

abilities.description: Normal attack targets have 25% chances of increasing 10% more DMG taken.
abilities.name: The light that illuminates the darkness

606.description:
"This is all for the sake of Missy..."
A spirit transformed from the illuminated decorations for Christmas night. After he was thrown out during a snowy night, he was picked up by Star Atop Christmas Tree and later become her aide. He is one of those few who knows the true nature of the willy missy and his trust in her has never wavered even when she orders him around the clock. From the bottom of his heart, he truly wishes that happiness would come to Star Atop Christmas Tree. Perhaps it was due to his upbringing by his grandfather, he talks in a way that makes him sound like a old man. It is probably a reflection of his filial piety. However, he will show no mercy to anyone who dares to harm the missy and is capable of killing without hesitation.
[Event] Two Santas
606.name: Christmas Lights

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Parade of Electricity and Light

abilities.description: Increases 36% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Star of glory

607.description:
"There only needs to be one at the top!"
A spirit transformed from the decorative stars traditionally placed on top of a Christmas tree. Firmly believing that Christmas would be ruined without her as the main character, she has an ego that is larger than life. Her arrogant words and demeanor not only reflect her lack of social experience but make her borderline obnoxious. While she is gentle by nature, because of her problematic conduct, most of the troubles she found herself in can be attributed to her. And it is exactly what had happened for this event; all she needed to do was to follow the instructions of Miss Santa and play her part in delivering the presents as an activity to build her social experience, and yet... It is worth mentioning that even as ignorant as she is, she has been infatuated with the origin of Christmas trees – the "Tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil", to the point of idolizing the tree.
[Event] Two Santas
607.name: Star Atop Christmas Tree

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Star of Brilliance

abilities.description: Increases 7% of the EXP gained from battle.
abilities.name: Premium food ingredients

608.description:
"Have I fallen behind?"
The spirit of a legendary bird that has plumes of seven different colors. Of course, it is actually a description for roasted turkey. Christmas just wouldn't be right without me! She has semi-aggressively vied for the job of food catering for the party and for some strange reason, she seems to be in low spirits. If one were to ask about the cause of her perplexity, the only response from her would be a murmur of pessimism such as "because the only way to go after reaching the top, is down..." One can't help but wonder what had happened to her, who used to be so confident about herself...
[Event] Two Santas
608.name: Turkey Lurkey [Christmas]

skill.description: Increases the Crit Rate of the ally with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: The Final Poultry

abilities.description: Increases 15% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies Phantasma team members at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: The great monster of the sea

609.description:
"Hey, we are good friends, aren't we?　We are great friends, right?　No, we are BFFs, wouldn't you say?"
A spirit transformed from the great sea monster referenced in the Hebrew Bible. She is also the demon that embodies Envy, one of the seven deadly sins. Perhaps it's due to her association with the sin of "Envy", she has the habit of quickly becoming envious of others for even the most trivial matter. A terrible shame, given her incredible beauty. On the flipside, she has trouble dealing with praises from others and when she receives any compliment, she would blush and just blindly follow whatever that person says. This makes her extremely easy to manipulate and because of this glaring flaw in her personality, there are few people she would refer to as her friends. Consequently, she is infatuated with becoming close friends with others. She used to have many spirits who got along fine with her in the past, but they all shared the same sentiment: "Her love is simply too oppressive".
[Event] Two Santas
609.name: Leviathan

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to 2 allies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Super Tsunami

61.description:
«No te preocupes: ¡mi espada es firme como una roca!».
Una animia que luchó arduamente al lado de su joven señor hasta que este se convirtió en un general muy temido. En palabras de este espíritu, su dedicación, su ardiente retórica y su fuerza fueron grandes influencias para su señor durante sus años de formación.
