abilities.name: Mastermind

738.description:
"Make your choice; serve me, or die……"
A spirit transformed from the legendary warlord, politician and hero who has left the world with incredible literary works as his legacy. The true leader of the Clavicle of the King; he is the mastermind who wishes to free spirits from the control of mankind. To achieve his ambition, he has spent years in meticulous planning and preparation. In fact, even the past encounters he has had were simply part of his stratagem. He was the cruel and merciless tyrant who once love mankind more than anyone else but ended up being responsible for the deaths of most men in history. Just what exactly he sees through his dark, burning pupils ...nobody will ever know.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
738.name: 9ebe47c

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Blade of Ruinous Seven Stars

abilities.description: Increases 25% of Crit DMG by the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of every wave.
abilities.name: Karmic Liberation

abilities.description: Increases skill DMG of all team members by 45% when this daemon is Team Leader.
abilities.name: Director of the Bureau of the Occult

739.description:
"Alright, pull yourself together already!"
The Director of the Bureau of the Occult and the young mistress of the Tsuchimikado Clan. Borrowing the power of Senji Ryakketsu, she merged with Shuten Doji and become the ultimate entity - a "joker" that commands power beyond the comprehension of human wisdom. Born with the most powerful spirit essence ever gifted to heirs of the Tsuchimikado Clan, she led a secluded life from the mortal world and grew up with spirits and demons instead. As a result, she has grown to see spirits and demons as equals to mankind. Because of this, she secretly developed a method of manifestation that is unrestricted by karma and named her technique as "Karmic Liberation" - giving life to numerous spirits who could live in freedom. Her greatest wish is to create a world where humans, spirits and demons can live in peace, harmony and joy. Nevertheless, for spirit agents who use and order demons as tools and soldiers, her ideas are nothing short of radical and out of the box. Will the concept and vision of a world of inclusion and harmony be accepted by mankind? The answer is still out there.
[Event] Clavicle of the King
739.name: 4656f4b

skill.description: Increases the DMG of 2 allies with the highest ATK by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Sword of Protection/Blade of Annihilation

abilities.description: Sube ligeramente la tasa de aparición de recompensas de batalla.
abilities.name: Diosa de la prosperidad

74.description:
«¿Cómo puedo hacer que mi hermana me quiera?».
Diosa del alumbramiento y la crianza en la mitología japonesa y hermana menor de la princesa Iwanaga. Además de ser la viva imagen de la gracia y el decoro, su enorme encanto despierta la envidia de su hermana mayor, que alberga un odio inmenso hacia la benjamina. Desesperada por recomponer su relación, Sakuya se deja aconsejar sobre cómo recuperar el afecto de su pérfida hermana.
74.name: Sakuya Konohana

skill.description: Restaura {value} de PS a los 2 aliados con menos % de PS. Los objetivos sufren un -{delay1} de daño temporalmente.
skill.name: Lluvia de pétalos

abilities.description: Increases 25% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK.
abilities.name: Deputy Director of the Bureau of the Occult

abilities.description: Increases 10% of DMG of Phantasma team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Demon King

740.description:
"It's been so long since my last fight. Don't blame me if I have forgotten how to pull my punches."
A spirit transformed from the most powerful entity that is the leader figure for all spirits and demons in Japan. He was once the mighty demon that brought terror unto this world from his lair at Mount Oe. However, he was put into an extended slumber due to Minamoto no Yorimitsu's clever ambush. When he manifested in the modern days, his terrible grudge drove him to exact his revenge on mankind but was utterly humbled by Tsuchimikado Mikado as he finally tasted defeat. Just as he thought he would be put to a long slumber, he was surprised by the fact that Mikado had not sealed him away and instead chose to befriend him. This period of placid serenity helped him to find peace within his heart. Even though he can't find it in himself to show his true feelings in the presence of Mikado, he is extremely loyal to her and will even willingly give up his life for her sake. And it is thanks to Mikado that he managed to see heart to heart with Dojigiri Yasutsuna, his once sworn enemy...
740.name: 772a4bf

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to enemy with highest ATK, target receives {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Psalm of Destructive Sin

abilities.description: Reduces 15% of DMG taken of all team members; increases 20% of ATK speed at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Impeccable Visage

abilities.description: Increases 43% of crit rate and increases 100% of crit DMG of skill targets at the same time.
abilities.name: Da Liu Ren

741.description:
"What's this? How did that adorable little darling ended up being such an old hag……"
A spirit transformed from the oldest tome of divination in Japan that has been passed down as a family heirloom in the Tsuchimikado Clan. With the spirit of Abe no Seimei residing in the tome, she has been taking care of Mikado ever since she was a little girl and reverted to her true form as a tome when she matured. She is one of the very few spirits that truly understands the inner workings of the world through techniques of divination and the truth behind the existence of spirits. Despite appearing to be a loquacious individual who has trouble keeping her mouth shut, she is actually cunningly diverting the subject with useless trivial talks so that she never has to impart what really matters. In other words, she achieves her silence through ceaselessly talking. No one has greater confidence in Mikado's potentials and strengths than her and whenever Mikado finds herself in crisis, she would break her seal and manifest in the world.
741.name: fb83a99

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Qimen Dunjia Formation

abilities.description: Increases 10% of the EXP gained from battle and increases 10% of battle reward drop rate.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Goddess of Performance

742.description:
"Here's a song for you to keep you entertained!"
A spirit transformed from the goddess of dance and performance in Japanese mythology. She is the oldest dancer in the history of Japan and it is said that all who see her dance would become captivated by her performance. According to rumor, her latest goal is to become an idol who can sing as well as she can dance but apparently her progress in singing has not improved by the slightest. Only heaven knows if the day she becomes an idol would ever come. She is also one of the best friends of Cherry Blossom Front from the same agency. But as flowers don't bloom in the Underworld, Cherry Blossom Front would be entirely useless, and thus she has taken Cherry Blossom Front's place in this incident. And lastly, she is still on bad terms with Goddess Amaterasu...
742.name: 57e8f37

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Song of Angel

abilities.description: Increases 35% of Skill DMG and 35% of Crit DMG.
abilities.name: Extraterrestrial Princess

743.description:
"Hohoho!　How did you like that? Very sexy right?"
This is the true form of the spirit transformed from the princess of the moon when she unleashes her true powers. When her stores of lunar energy reach the maximum, she will be able to maintain this form for 5 minutes. Her true identity is an extraterrestrial demon lord who has been banished to this dimension to atone for her sins. She has the ability to manipulate gravity; she doesn't age and will never die. However, such powers are sealed off completely when she is in the form of a child. If she really wishes to, she could easily turn Earth into a black hole without breaking a sweat. But now that she has befriended other spirits, she no longer finds it in herself to do such a thing. A demon lord who cannot stand to be alone due to fear of solitude has apparently gone out to play with her friends today, as usual.
743.name: 21af77d

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Gravitational Disintegration

abilities.description: Increases 15% of DMG of all allies at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Legendary Instrument

744.description:
"Complacency rots the soul……and I'll never want that to happen to me."
A spirit transformed from the priceless acoustic guitar made by the renowned luthier Antonio Stradivari. She is the guitarist of unparalleled renown in the genre of spirit music. She used to be a lady from an extremely affluent family. But as she loathes a lifestyle of material comfort without challenges and hardship, she grabbed a guitar and simply left home, without any knowledge of the world. As she led a life of a street performer who can barely put food on her table, she encountered Homer, who shares similar values and beliefs with her. The two have been partners ever since. It is said that their neighbors would hear the sounds of guitar duet from the run-down apartment they once dwelled from time to time and such stories have become legends... Not only that, she actually jammed with a saucepan once but the session ended up in a fight due to differences in their perceived musicality. She will probably never accept any offer for ensemble or group performance from now on.
744.name: 96d4dab

skill.description: Deals {value} DMG to all enemies; decreases targets' speed by {delay1} for a limited time.
skill.name: Resonating Eradication

abilities.description: Increases own level by 15.
abilities.name: Beautiful Princess of True Ancestor

745.description:
"Come, let the roses of blood bloom."
A spirit transformed the beautiful princess and one of the true ancestors of vampires. She is the chief of the 108 clans of vampires with the lineage of true ancestors - an energetic girl who is most trusted by Count Dracula. Despite being a vampire, she is not affected by sunlight in anyway and can withstand direct exposure. Apparently she has used it as an excuse to go about all sorts of places to have fun using the excuse of going on missions. Not only that, since food in modern times are much richer in nutritional values, she apparently no longer has to drink blood for sustenance. But even so, one will find his life force secretly drained away if he ever gets careless. One should never let his/her guard down just because of her appearance as a bishojo. On a related note, her ability is "Bloody Create." It allows her to manipulate the iron in her blood to create all sorts of weapons and devices of torture as she wishes.
745.name: 033a167

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a los 2 rivales con menos PS. Los objetivos dañan un +{delay1} temporalmente.
skill.name: Bloody Spiral

abilities.description: Increases 50% of Skill DMG at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Huntress of the Dark

746.description:
"Let me show you my secret techniques that men will never be able to imitate!"
A spirit transformed from a female jonin -a leader of all female ninjas. She is the mentor of Camellia and Peony and has been nicknamed as "The Dark Hunter" while serving as the Captain of the Exorcist Squad. Apart from her exceptional fighting techniques and her cool head, her "charisma" is the deadliest weapon in her arsenal. Just as her opponents become bewitched by her sensual charms, she would take them out with a sudden attack that came from nowhere. Consequently, male spirits have grown to develop a genuine fear of her ……Apparently she has been rather upset about the ineptitude of dames who do not know how to leverage their gifts as women.
746.name: 1e1d7de

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Ran‧Kachofugetsu

abilities.description: Skill attacks increase 40% DMG taken by targets.
abilities.name: Legacy of Yagyu Shinkage-ryu

747.description:
"You have to defeat me first before you can claim to be the strongest!"
A spirit transformed from the famed odachi that has been passed down as a family heirloom; a great weapon that runs more than two meters in length. Anyone who is deemed worthy of wielding her must have proven his/her mettle as the true heir and master of the Yagyu Shinkage-ryu. As she embodies the honor of a prestigious martial family with profound history, she is well-mannered and gracious in her demeanors. But due to her absolute confidence in her own abilities and strengths, she would inadvertently perceive others in a condescending manner...The truth is, she is a dame who knows little of the ways of the world and whenever she gets called out on this fact, she would become infuriated. In fact, this whole incident wouldn't have happened if this wasn't brought up in conversation when she went on a blind date... She really has tons of energy as a young lady, that's for certain. On a side note, she almost had no experience in dealing with other famed swords and katanas. The only friend she gets along well is Kuji Kanesada, whom she often spars with.
[Event] Guild Conquest
747.name: c999b15

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Edge of Destruction

abilities.description: 3f201ff
abilities.name: 4496ee8

748.description:
"Please look upon me all you like!"
A ghost only visible on New Year's Day, and widely believed to be extremely valuable. Bowing down before her beauty is said to ensure peace and tranquility for the year ahead. But, actually, contrary to popular belief, she's always wandering around here and there. It's just that no one takes any notice of her until New Year's Day. She's a pretty lonely ghost for the rest of the year, and craves more attention.
748.name: New Year Sunrise

skill.description: Restore {value} HP to self, increase crit rate for a limited time {delay1}
skill.name: New Year Sunrise

abilities.description: All divina allies take 10% less DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Ruler of Night

abilities.description: Increases 15% of skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Dark Affinity

749.description:
"I'll paint the sky black so that everyone can sleep peacefully."
Original form. One of Greek mythology's original deities, and the goddess of night. She lives together with her good friend Hemera, the goddess of day.
749.name: Nyx

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Eternal Night Veil

75.description:
«¿Cómo que tengo doble personalidad? ¡Fuera de mi vista!».
Esta animia de una pistola perfectamente conservada conoce muy bien el frente de guerra. Tiene un aspecto muy dulce, pero resulta temible con un arma en la mano. Aunque carece de formación oficial, es experta en táctica militar: puede enfrentarse ella sola a varios soldados veteranos y salir victoriosa sin rasguño alguno. Su única desventaja es su limitada estatura.
75.name: Pistola Tokarev

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a un rival (prioridad sanadores).
skill.name: Tiro a la cabeza

abilities.description: Normal attacks have 7% chances of inflicting Freeze.
abilities.name: Snow Spirit's Frolic

750.description:
"Hey, you! Come and play with me! You want a snowball fight? Mind if I use icicles? Tee hee... How about we build a snowman? Yippee!"
A child spirit who appears in snowy territories. The family of any who play with her are said to be blessed with good fortune for generations to come.
750.name: Snow Sprite

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual, con {probability} de congelarlos.
skill.name: Dance of Ice and Snow

abilities.description: Increases 15% of the EXP gained from battle.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Shichi-Go-San Rite

abilities.description: Increases battle reward drop rate by 25%.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Precocious Expert

751.description:
"You look like you've never tied an obi before!"
A spirit who embodies the traditional Japanese ceremony where a seven-year old girl puts on her first obi sash. She is rather precocious, believing herself to be an expert on all things sash-related, and she likes to lord it over less enlightened children. It is true that girls are often more mature than boys at that age, but considering herself a full-blown grown-up might be taking things too far.
751.name: Obi Ceremony

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Alluring Aura

abilities.description: Increases 40% of skill DMG of the 2 allies with highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
abilities.name: Prayer for Growth

abilities.description: Increases 40% of crit rate and increases 90% of crit DMG of skill targets at the same time.
abilities.name: Not to be Outdone

752.description:
"Ready, set, jump!"
A spirit who embodies the traditional Japanese ceremony where a five-year old boy dons his first hakama robe. Believing that his ceremony was getting overlooked in favor of all the other events in the Shichi-Go-San Children's Festival, he became determined to raise its profile. He's willing to do anything to get people to acknowledge the supreme importance of the hakama ceremony - even stepping on his close friends' toes. He usually apologizes for this afterwards, though.
752.name: Hakama Ceremony

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to ally with the highest ATK,Targets receive {delay1} less DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Dropkick

abilities.description: All Divina team members deal 25% more DMG.(only take effect once to the team)
abilities.name: Queen's Knight

753.description:
"I would lay down my life in service of my Queen."
A dashing swordsman who serves the Queen of Hearts. Blessed with a heroic disposition and admirably egalitarian in his treatment of others, he's rather popular with the ladies. His background is somewhat shrouded in mystery, but that's a story for another time.
753.name: Jack of Hearts

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Blinding Flash

abilities.description: All Anima team members take 5% less DMG
abilities.name: Centennial Tune

abilities.description: Restores 5% HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.
abilities.name: Healing Opus

754.description:
"Does the sound of the koto harp not cause your chest to swell?"
The Anima of a koto harp, who plays beautiful music. Her music heals those who listen to it, and she plays dutifully every day.
754.name: Kotofurunushi

skill.description: Restores {value} HP to all allies. Targets deal {delay1} more DMG for a limited time.
skill.name: Elegant Melody

abilities.description: Increases Combat Damage by 30%.
abilities.name: Faerie King's Magic Bow

abilities.description: Increases Attack Speed by 50% when 'Oberon' is present.
abilities.name: Oberon's Decree

755.description:
"Name your target and I'll shoot it right down!"
The soul of Oberon's bow. The arrows fired from this magic-infused bow have never once failed to strike their target, but he only ever listens to what Oberon tells him to do.
755.name: Arko

skill.description: Can be used as bond and in guild conquest.
skill.name: Bullseye

76.description:
«Si valoras tu vida, no te acerques más a esa lagartija».
Los colmillos de este espíritu de un lagarto son muy venenosos. Alberga un odio tremendo a los cazadores furtivos y ha decidido consagrar su vida a acabar con cualquiera que se atreva a hacerles daño a sus amigos saurios.
76.name: Dragón de Komodo

skill.description: Sube temporalmente la tasa de golpes críticos de 3 aliados (prioridad a distancia) un {delay1}.
skill.name: Encantador de serpientes

77.description:
«¿Puedo ayudarte? ¿Tal vez a morir?».
La animia de la vestimenta que llevaba el mítico ninja Hanzo Hattori. Una fanática obsesionada con Hanzo que imita a su ídolo en todo: desde su forma de hablar hasta sus hábitos y sus tics.

changes.new:
"Can I help you? To DIE, perhaps?"
The Anima of attire once worn by legendary ninja Hattori Hanzo. A Hanzo fanatic who imitates every aspect of her idol, from the way he talks right down to his ticks and habits.
[Special Bond] Increases “Hattori Hanzo” max HP
changes.old:
"Can I help you? To DIE, perhaps?"
The Anima of attire once worn by legendary ninja Hattori Hanzo. A Hanzo fanatic who imitates every aspect of her idol, from the way he talks right down to his ticks and habits.
[Special Bond] Increases “{#MonsterName#391}” max HP

77.name: Uniforme de Hanzo

skill.description: Sube temporalmente la tasa de golpes críticos del aliado con más ATQ un {delay1}.
skill.name: Secretos shinobi

78.description:
«¡Pero yo soy la que más me esfuerzo!».
El espíritu élfico surgido de un elemento químico. Componente del popular grupo de MBE (música de baile élfica) ELF 118. A pesar de todos sus esfuerzos, es la menos admirada de todo el grupo. Por desgracia, sus aburridos atuendos y su insignificante presencia escénica le auguran que probablemente seguirá en un segundo plano durante bastante tiempo.
78.name: Elfa del helio

skill.description: Reduce temporalmente el daño sufrido de los 2 aliados con menos % de PS un {delay1}.
skill.name: Danza macabra

79.description:
«¡Tú vas continuación!».
Una jinete a lomos de un caballo sin cabeza que pasa las noches buscando a quién atormentar. Desaparece tras ver la expresión de terror de sus víctimas, pero estas se quedan traumatizadas durante mucho tiempo después del encuentro. Se rumorea que ella misma difunde historias de sus apariciones para aumentar su fama en el mundo fantasmal.
79.name: Bromista nocturna

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a un rival aleatorio.
skill.name: Triquiñuela sádica

8.description:
«¡Ñam! ¡Umm, qué cosa más rica!».
El espíritu de una gigante de la mitología escandinava. Le encanta la comida y valora cualquier manjar sin importar de dónde provenga. Cuando tiene que viajar a algún lugar remoto, se transforma en un águila y disfruta del trayecto surcando los cielos. El único problema es que, dado que es una gigante, tiene que comer un montón para saciar su apetito. Algunos restaurantes le han prohibido el acceso. Últimamente, su local favorito es uno situado en el Lejano Oriente llamado «CHEZ JOHN'S» (su dueño no es muy ducho con los idiomas...).
8.name: Hraesvelgr

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a los rivales de alrededor.
skill.name: Gran mordisco

80.description:
«¡Prepárate para luchar conmigo!».
La animia de una antiquísima arma de artes marciales okinawenses.. Una luchadora tan prodigiosa como su origen sugiere, es especialmente hábil en las técnicas de autodefensa. Tras viajar hasta Tokio con la intención machacar a un montón de criminales, se halla bastante decepcionada, pues acabó encontrando muchos menos de los que se esperaba.
80.name: Tonfa

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual.
skill.name: Dragones gemelos

81.description:
«Tan solo puedo rezar...».
El espíritu de una flor del infierno, reconocible por sus bulbos rojos coronando un tallo sin hojas. Su belleza camina sobre la delgada línea entre lo deslumbrante y lo despiadado, dotando a su aspecto de un aire celestial o infernal, dependiendo del ánimo de quien la contempla. Ambas interpretaciones pueden definirla perfectamente cuando se yergue, serena e inmóvil, en comunión con su entorno.
81.name: Lycoris radiata

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual, con {probability} de envenenarlos levemente.
skill.name: Ramo funerario

82.description:
«¡Oh, vamos, lluvia! ¡Solo una gotita!».
Una aprendiz primeriza al lado de otros espíritus que controlan la lluvia. Aunque llega a hacer que caiga un chubasco cuando se concentra lo suficiente, todavía le falta conseguir un aguacero continuado. Cautivada por sus héroes, que pueden provocar inundaciones y diluvios, se pasa los días reuniendo hasta la última gota que es capaz de invocar.
82.name: Llovizna

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual.
skill.name: Lluvia intensa

83.description:
«Buscando una momia a la embalsamar y pasar un buen rato».
Esta animia de una venda estuvo cubriendo la momia de un sumo sacerdote solitario. Tras contemplar cómo su antiguo dueño alcanzaba el nirvana, decidió que ella seguramente no tenía lo que hacía falta para seguir sus pasos.
83.name: Venda de momia

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual y reduce temporalmente su velocidad un {delay1}.
skill.name: Vínculo total

abilities.description: Sube levemente la tasa de golpes críticos de los aliados.
abilities.name: Sabio supremo

abilities.description: Restaura los PS de los 2 aliados con menos % de PS al iniciar una ronda.
abilities.name: Método socrático

84.description:
«El mundo está lleno misterios insondables, entre ellos mi esposa».
El abuelo de todos los filósofos de la antigua Grecia. Un célebre erudito y un pensador adelantado a su tiempo, Sócrates se ganó muchos enemigos cuando se atrevió a tratar de demostrar que el Oráculo de Delfos se equivocaba. Sin embargo, no culpó a nadie más de este dilema: tuvo la previsión de saber que esto solo le traería más problemas.
84.name: Sócrates

skill.description: Reduce temporalmente la DEF de todos los rivales un {delay1}.
skill.name: Susurros de sabiduría

85.description:
«¿Tienes algún plan para más tarde?».
Una princesa enamoradiza en búsqueda constante de potenciales pretendientes. Por algún motivo, se transformó en una serpiente gigantesca tras sufrir incontables decepciones amorosas. Se queda petrificada si observa que su objeto de deseo muestra el más mínimo indicio de no corresponder sus intensos sentimientos y disfruta regodeándose en un dolor que ella misma se ha buscado.
85.name: Kiyo

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 2 rivales (prioridad a distancia).
skill.name: Pasión tormentosa

86.description:
«¡Que nadie se me acerque! ¡Hasta las sombras sufrirán mi ira!».
Curtida en mil batallas, se trata de la montura de Bu Lü, el villano de la famosísima novela épica china «El Romance de los Tres Reinos». Su ardiente melena evoca imágenes de cicatrices infligidas en desolados campos de batalla. Incluso como espíritu, solo quiere llevar a Bu Lü, y se niega a que nadie más la dome.
86.name: Liebre roja

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a la fila de rivales directamente al frente.
skill.name: Resplandor carmesí

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente las piedras de alma recibidas en combate.
abilities.name: Guardián del oro

87.description:
«¿Quieres quitarme mi oro? Me gustaría verte intentarlo...».
Una criatura mitológica que aparece en muchas leyendas antiguas y se la considera la encarnación de la arrogancia. Es una fusión entre los reyes de las bestias y de las aves, por lo que suele ser un símbolo de la realeza. Por supuesto, este presuntuoso cree que todo esto solo se debe a su enorme popularidad.
87.name: Grifo

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual.
skill.name: Golpe súbito

abilities.description: Reduce enormemente el daño sufrido con un 1/3 de PS o menos.
abilities.name: Voluntad inquebrantable

88.description:
«Tal vez los cielos te perdonen, ¡pero yo no!».
El material más duro conocido por la humanidad. Poseedora de una voluntad adamantina propia de su nombre, la espada legendaria de esta joven guerrera despide rayos de luz de arcoíris que atraviesan a sus enemigos. Pese a su imagen de fortaleza, se dice que su noble alma es frágil como el cristal. Ten cuidado: no la resquebrajes... ni dejes que ella te resquebraje a ti.
88.name: Diamante

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a la fila de rivales directamente al frente.
skill.name: Tajo prismático

abilities.description: Otorga alguna probabilidad de envenenar con ataques normales.
abilities.name: Sugestión diabólica

abilities.description: Transforma parte del daño causado en PS.
abilities.name: Pacto faustiano

89.description:
«Eso es, ¡no temas! Al fin y al cabo, yo te protejo...».
Hace realidad los deseos de quienquiera que esté dispuesto a hacer un trato con él a cambio de su alma. Nadie sabe exactamente qué pasa por su cabeza la mayoría del tiempo, aunque probablemente esté relacionado con recaudar las deudas de sus desafortunadas víctimas y arrastrarlas gritando y pataleando hasta el inframundo.
89.name: Mefistófeles

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al rival con más PS y lo envenena gravemente con {probability}.
skill.name: El precio del deseo

abilities.description: Otorga bastante probabilidad de aletargar con ataques de destreza.
abilities.name: Vínculo de pesadilla

9.description:
«Eh, sí, ya lo veo. Hay un continente oculto bajo el mar...».
El libro prohibido de los mitos de Cthulhu. Al parecer, alberga sendos secretos, leyendas y símbolos, pero tiene tan mala memoria que cuesta sonsacárselos. Lleva ya tiempo siendo un espíritu y tiene tanto amigos como seguidores en todo el mundo.
9.name: R'lyeh

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 2 rivales (prioridad a distancia).
skill.name: Portal demoniaco

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente el daño causado.
abilities.name: Sacerdotisa

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente el daño de los miembros divinia con este demonio de líder.
abilities.name: Reina de Yamato

90.description:
«¡Cálmate! ¿Con quién crees que estás hablando? (Bien, ¡me ha quedado de lo más regio!)».
El espíritu de una reina hechicera que gobernó el país de Yamatai hace mucho, mucho tiempo. Sus hechizos eran enormemente poderosos y, con ellos, logró salvar su reino en muchas ocasiones. Así es como pasó de ser una de las muchas sacerdotisas a convertirse en reina. De hecho, le gustaba ser sacerdotisa, pero su sentido de la responsabilidad le impidió rechazar la oferta de gobernar el reino, por lo que ha decidido empezar a actuar como una auténtica monarca. Para su sorpresa, se siente muy realizada y cómoda en su nuevo papel.
90.name: Himiko

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a los 3 rivales con más ATQ, con {probability} de silenciarlos.
skill.name: Oráculo infalible

abilities.description: Otorga poca probabilidad de aturdir con ataques de destreza.
abilities.name: Caballero mágico japonés

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

91.description:
«¡Tu vida no sirve para nada si no tratas de mejorar constantemente!».
El espíritu de una espada taoísta con el número 9 grabado en ella. No solo es increíblemente afilada, sino que también posee un increíble poder contra los monstruos gracias al número que tiene grabado. Tiene una gran confianza en su propio talento y no soporta a quienes hablan mucho pero no actúan. Se esfuerza por perfeccionar sus sentidos a diario con arduos entrenamientos. Y, si lo saludas con cierta desgana, acabarás derramando sangre. Se rumorea que es mucho más benevolente con las personas ambiciosas que se esfuerzan por mejorar.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
91.name: Kuji Kanesada

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño al objetivo actual.
skill.name: Afilada hoja de virtud

abilities.description: Restaura los PS del aliado con menos % de PS al iniciar una ronda.
abilities.name: Madre de todos

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

92.description:
«A fin de cuentas, soy una deidad guardiana del budismo».
El espíritu de una diosa guardiana budista. Como diosa del alumbramiento sin complicaciones y de la crianza de los hijos, posee una personalidad muy maternal. Sin embargo, cuando se enfurece, se convierte en una laksa y se pone a perseguir a todo el mundo, así que nadie se atreve a hacerle enfadar. Además, ella tampoco quiere que los niños la vean en su forma de laksa. Quienes llegan a enfurecerla aprenden el significado del auténtico pavor.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
92.name: Hariti

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 2 rivales (prioridad CaC).
skill.name: Segundo advenimiento de la laksa

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente el daño crítico de los aliados.
abilities.name: Estratega genial

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

93.description:
«¡Soy igual de lista que mi hermano!».
El espíritu de la hermana de un famoso estratega militar del período de los Tres Reinos de la historia de China. Está algo acomplejada porque su nombre no ha trascendido en la historia como el de su hermano, aunque ella se esforzaba tanto como él y era igual de inteligente. Desde que se convirtió en espíritu, ha hecho todo lo que está en su mano para labrarse un nombre por sí misma.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
93.name: Ling Zhuge

skill.description: Sube temporalmente el daño sufrido por 2 rivales aleatorios un {delay1}.
skill.name: Ingenio agudo

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

94.description:
«Nada que se me da bien además del tiro con arco».
Es el espíritu femenino del arco de un afamado héroe de la mitología china. Este arco se usó para abatir a los nueve soles en la leyenda. Se trata de una chica dulce y apacible que, además, es una avezada arquera, pero tiene una personalidad un tanto débil y suele meterse en apuros. Sin embargo, esto la ha convertido en una experta en los problemas de la vida diaria. Le asustan los cuervos y sale corriendo a esconderse cada vez que ve uno hasta que se marcha. Cuando le preguntan el motivo, dice que le recuerdan a la vez que tuvo que abatir a los nueve pájaros sol.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
94.name: Arco escarlata

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a 2 rivales (prioridad a distancia).
skill.name: Disparo certero

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

95.description:
«¿Quién osa menospreciar el valor de un comandante francés?».
El espíritu de un comandante recordado como un héroe y salvador de Francia. Es más conocido por todas las cosas perversas que cometió en su vida, así que casi todos tienen una idea equivocada sobre él y lo evitan a toda costa. Sin embargo, él se arrepiente de lo que hizo en el pasado y está buscando una forma de redimirse. Tiene una fuerza digna de un auténtico héroe y siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de Juana de Arco, a la que ve como una hermana pequeña. Por algún motivo, parece que no se lleva nada bien con cierta arcángel.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
95.name: Gilles de Rais

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a todos los rivales.
skill.name: Arenga

abilities.description: Te vuelve inmune al veneno.
abilities.name: Poder de Amitabha

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

96.description:
«Confía en mí y te prestaré mi poder».
El espíritu de una placa de bronce con la imagen de Buda grabada en ella. Lejos de ser una bodhisattva iluminada, le encanta ser el centro de atención. Su vanidad se ha vuelto mucho mayor desde que la declararon tesoro nacional. Pese a todo, posee una enorme fe y una fuerza innegable, por lo que mucha gente confía plenamente en ella.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
96.name: Amitabha Tathagata

skill.description: Restaura {value} de PS a todos los aliados y les cura el veneno.
skill.name: Ojo divino de Buda

abilities.description: Restaura los PS de los aliados al iniciar una ronda.
abilities.name: Arcángel

from_description.event_name: Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!

97.description:
«¿Te interesan las revelaciones divinas?».
El espíritu de una arcángel, considerada la más importante de todos los ángeles. Motivada por su gran fe en Dios, lleva a cabo muchas acciones para hacer el bien, aunque las cosas no siempre salen como ella planea. Esto hace que se frustre muchísimo y que, a veces, las cosas acaben siendo aún peor que al principio. Aun así, sigue reinando como arcángel suprema gracias a su dedicación y su fe sin parangón.
Evento ¡Revuelta! ¡Un día de batallas en Shinjuku!
97.name: Mikhaela

skill.description: Restaura {value} de PS a 3 aliados (prioridad CaC). Los objetivos sufren un -{delay1} de daño temporalmente.
skill.name: Salvación por revelación

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente el daño causado con Takeda Shingen en el equipo.
abilities.name: Afectuoso señor de la guerra

abilities.description: Reduce levemente el daño que sufren los aliados CaC y sube ligeramente el que causan.
abilities.name: Dios de la Guerra

98.description:
«Esta batalla es mía».
El espíritu femenino de un daimio del periodo de los Estados en Guerra, conocido como el Dios de la Guerra. Puede derrotar fácilmente a sus enemigos incluso cuando la superan en número, por lo que sus batallas nunca terminan en tablas. Ha sido bendecida tanto con belleza como con fuerza. Kenshin Uesugi fue un hombre en vida, pero por circunstancias atenuantes, tomó una forma femenina al convertirse en espíritu.
98.name: Kenshin Uesugi

skill.description: Causa {value} de daño a todos los rivales.
skill.name: Presión divina

abilities.description: Sube moderadamente la tasa de golpes críticos con Quimera e Hidra en el equipo.
abilities.name: Tres bestias, un cuerpo

99.description:
«Transformación al modo Cerbero!».
Se trata de Quimera ataviada con títeres basados en Cerbero, el perro guardián del inframundo. Su personalidad cambia según los títeres que lleve puestos en las manos, así que las cosas pueden desmadrarse rápidamente con la combinación adecuada. Tras hacer llorar a unos niños, le prohibieron que volviese actuar frente a ellos.

changes.new:
"Transforming to Cerberus mode!"
A chimera with a puppet based on Cerberus, the watchdog of the underworld. Her personality changes based on the puppet that she's using, so things can get pretty crazy with the right combination. After making some kids cry, she's not allowed to perform for them anymore.
[Special Bond] Increases “Orthrus [Festival]”’s skill DMG
